loans.name: Specioza

texts.en:
This 37-year-old married woman used the previous loan to buy crates of beer for resale. With the profits, Specioza has been able to pay school fees for her children and also expand her bar. 

She still has challenges of inadequate capital to meet the increasing demand. Her dream is to have a well-stocked bar and restaurant. Specioza intends to buy beer for resale with this loan.

loans.use: to buy beer for resale.

loans.name: Domitilio

texts.en:
Domitilio is 60 years old, married to a house keeper and together involved in raising hogs to fatten and breed. This is the primary source of their income. Domitilio also serves the community as a Counselor at their Barangay. The couple had eight children. Seven of them settled into marriage and live separately with them. The youngest is still in high school. Though his children, live separately from them, he still helped them in times of need especially on financial matters. 

He is now asking for this loan to have an additional capital to enhance his hog raising business. He is asking for P20,000 to buy medicines, vitamins and hog feed for sustainability. He wants to ensure proper growth of hogs so that he can offer it at a higher cost upon disposal. He also hopes to renovate the pigpen. 

Someday, with his patience, sacrifices and hard works, he will achieve his goal of financial stability.

loans.use: to buy medicines, vitamins and hog feed for sutsainanbilty

loans.name: Jingle

texts.en:
Jingle is a housewife who lives at CApatan with her spouse and two young children. Jingle's spouse provide motorcycle transport services as his source of income while Jingle is raising hogs to re-sell fro profits. Together, they work hand in hand in order to amke their businesses profitable. Jingle had an insufficinet to sustain her hogs so she is asking for a loan of P10,000 to buy vaccines and hog feed. This will help ensure good growth of her hogs. 

Despite poverty, the couple still aims that someday, they will earn enough funds to provide a good education for their children.

loans.use: to buy vaccines and hog feed

loans.name: Ahmad

texts.ru: Ахмад 49 – летний женатый мужчина. У него семеро детей. Его дети занимаются растениеводством. Сам Ахмад занимается скотоводством. Кредит берет для закупа мелко – рогатого скота.
texts.en: Ahmad is 49 year-old married man.  He has seven children.  His children are involved in agriculture.  Ahmad is involved in animal husbandry.  He is requesting this loan to purchase small livestock.

loans.use: to purchase small livestock

loans.name: Otgonbayar

texts.en:
Otgonbayar is 35 years old. She lives with her husband and 3 kids in a ger, a national Mongolian yurt, in Govisumber province of southern Mongolia. Her husband works as a butcher, and the 3 kids attend schools. 

Otgonbayar started her meat retailing business by renting a shop counter in 2009. Even though she is new to the business, she already has gained  many regular customers and trusted suppliers. Due to the approach of the Traditional festival, the need for meats is increased. In order to meet the demand, she needs financial support. She is a sharp and diligent woman who says "Our kids have come to their age of entering college. So I need to act aggressively to send my kids to college." She is requesting 564,000 MNT to buy more meat at wholesale and purchase new supplies such as dairy products.

loans.use: to buy more meat at wholesale and purchase new supplies such as dairy products

loans.name: Narantsetseg

texts.en: Narantsetseg is 57 years old, and lives with her husband in Uvurhangai province of Mongolia. She has been running a small meat retailing business since 2000 with help from her husband. She purchases fresh and qualified meats from her trusted suppliers and delivers them to her regular customers. Now that Mongolia's biggest festival is approaching, she plans to purchase large quantities of fresh meats and sell them to the customers. She says that if it works well, she could afford a van for the business to ride and deliver the meats, which decreases her transport costs. She is requesting 3,000,000 MNT to purchase meat from herders.

loans.use: to purchase meat from herders

loans.name: Anthony

texts.en:
Anthony is a 29-year-old man. He is married and fathers one child. He sells household utensils in different markets in Ruaka. His wife is a farmer who sells eggs from her layers. Anthony has been in the business for four years now and gets a monthly income of 60,000 KES.

This will be Anthony’s third loan with KADET LTD. He plans to use the entire loan to purchase cups, spoons, cooking pots, and serving spoons to sell. With the profit that he will get, he wants to increase his variety of items. 

In the future, he wants to be able to build rental units on his piece of land.

loans.use: to increase stock of household utensils

loans.name: Jargalsaihan

texts.en: Jargalsaihan is 38 years old and lives with his wife in Mongolia's Arhangai province. His wife is a student. Since 2009, he has earned a living by using his car as a taxi. He also has a side business selling dairy products. He is applying for a loan for MNT 1,000,000 to buy more diary products to sell.  After his wife finishes her studies and graduates, he will be able to expand his businesses because she will be able to help.

loans.use: to buy more dairy products to sell to his customers.

loans.name: Huyen

texts.en: Huyen is 33 years old, married and lives with her husband and three sons in Ho Chi Minh City. She and her husband earn a living by making shoes out of leather. She is applying for a loan to buy leather and other materials she needs to make more shoes. Her goal is to keep her business running smoothly so that she can pay for her children's education.

loans.use: to buy leather and other supplies to make more shoes.

loans.name: Bich

texts.en: Bich is 30 years old, married and earns a living selling meals to people who live in her community. She lives with her husband and children in Ho Chi Minh City and is applying for a loan to buy more furniture, high-quality food and rice in bulk. She hopes this loan will allow her to better meet the needs of her current customers and attract new ones. Her goal is to increase her income and save money for any future difficulties that may face her family.

loans.use: to buy furniture, high-quality food and rice in bulk.

loans.name: Hiep

texts.en: Hie is 50 years old, married and helps support her family by operating a beauty shop. She lives in Ho Chi Minh City with her children and husband, who works as a mason. She has been in her current line of work for 12 years and is applying for a loan to buy supplies and equipment for her shop, including shampoo, dyes and nail polish. Her goal for the future is to continue expanding her shop so that she can improve her family's living conditions.

loans.use: to buy supplies for a beauty salon.

loans.name: Phuong

texts.en: Phuong is 34 years old, married and the mother of two children. She lives with her family in Ho Chi Minh City, where her husband works as a refrigeration mechanic. For the last five years, she has earned a living by selling clothes. She is applying for a loan to buy a greater quantity and variety of clothes to sell. She hopes this will allow her to better meet the needs of her existing customers and attract new ones. She also hopes that this loan will increase her income and allow her to improve her family's living conditions.

loans.use: to buy more clothing to sell to her customers.

loans.name: Anh

texts.en:
Anh is a 46-year-old woman with two children, a son and a daughter. She lives with her family in Ho Chi Minh City and makes money by selling soft drinks. Her husband supports the family by working as a silversmith.

For the past six years, Anh has run a food stall to cover her family's daily living expenses and her children's education fees. The business is going smoothly and she would like a loan to buy many kinds of beverages to provide to her customers.

She hopes this will increase her income, help her to improve her living conditions and allow her to set aside some savings.

loans.use: To buy many kinds of beverages to provide to her customers.

loans.name: Loan

texts.en:
Loan is a 46-year-old married woman living in Ho Chi Minh City. She has one son. Her husband is a driver. Loan earns a living running a general store, which she has done for 20 years. 

Loan would like to take out a loan to buy a greater variety and quantity of basic goods, such as milk, soft drinks, snack foods and confectionery to stock her general store. She hopes this will enable her to better meet the needs of her existing customers and attract additional customers. She also hopes that through the loan her business will generate a higher income and will help her to improve her family's living conditions and enable her to save money to meet any future difficulties.

loans.use: To buy a greater variety and quantity of basic goods, such as milk, soft drinks, snack foods and confectionery.

loans.name: Ngoc

texts.en:
Ngoc is a 47-year-old woman with three children, one son and two daughters. She lives with her family in Ho Chi Minh City and makes money by selling a variety of cold drinks. Her husband is a mechanic. 

For the past twenty years, Ngoc has run a drinks stall to cover her family's daily living expenses and her children's education fees. The business is going smoothly and she would like a loan to buy ingredients to make her own drinks as well as to purchase many other kinds of soft drinks to sell to her customers.

She hopes this will increase her income, help her to improve her living conditions and allow her to set aside some savings.

loans.use: To buy ingredients to make her own drinks as well as to purchase many other kinds of soft drinks to sell to her customers.

loans.name: Doleel Djigueene 49 Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe de crédit Doleel Djigueene 49 regroupe cinq femmes  qui font parti d’une grande association de développement. Leur activité consiste  à faire du commerce de divers produits.
La présidente, madame Fatou  vend des chaussures, des habits prêt à porter, des bijoux, des parfums etc.…Elle a une expérience de plus de dix ans dans ce domaine. Elle est marié et appui son époux sur les dépenses du foyer : frais de scolarité de ses enfants.
Avec l’épargne qu’elle fait elle envisage d’ouvrir  dans l’avenir un magasin.
.
texts.en:
The Doleel Djigueene 49 loan group comprises five women who belong to a large development association. They all have trading activities. The president, Fatou, sells shoes, ready-to-wear clothes, jewelry, perfume, etc. She has more than ten years' experience in this field. She is married and helps her husband out with the household expenses: her children's school fees. With the savings she makes she is planning to open a shop in the future. 
.

loans.use: to buy shoes, ready-to-wear clothes, jewelry, perfumes...

loans.name: Le

texts.en:
Le is a 48-year-old woman with three children, two sons and one daughter. She lives with her family in Ho Chi Minh City and makes money by selling breads and cakes. Her husband is a security guard. 

For the past twenty years, Le has run a food stall to cover her family's daily living expenses and her children's education fees. The business is going smoothly and she would like a loan to buy rice cakes and many kinds of breads and foods to provide to her customers.

She hopes this will increase her income, help her to improve her living conditions and allow her to set aside some savings.

loans.use: To buy rice cakes and many kinds of breads and foods to provide to her customers.

loans.name: Shohsanam

texts.ru: Шохсанам молодая трудолюбивая девушка. Она живет со своими родителями. У нее свой бизнес, и в бизнесе ей помогает  сестра.  Она занимается торговлей сухого и вареного гороха. От данного бизнеса она имеет хороший доход. Она хочет получить займ в размере 5 000 сомони для оптового закупа гороха. Она надеется на вашу помощь и поддержку. Cпасибо большое!
texts.en: Shohsanam is a hardworking young woman who lives with her parents and operates her own business.  Her sister helps her with the business.  Shohsanam sells dry and cooked peas, an activity that brings her a good income.  She would like to receive a loan in the amount of 5,000 somoni (TJS) in order to make a bulk purchase of peas.  She looks forward to your help and support.  Thank you very much!

loans.use: to buy peas.

loans.name: Gocha

texts.en:
Gocha is from Akhaltsikhe, South Georgia. He is 41 years old, married and lives with his family: his wife, Mzia, their two daughters who are 18 years old, their 17-year-old son and his parents who are retired. In addition to Gocha's parents' monthly pensions the only source of income for the family is agriculture. In particular, the family has small dairy farm. They produce various dairy products such as cheese and yoghurt and sell them on the local market. The total average monthly income of the family is 650 Laris. 

Gocha requested credit to purchase calves. He will rear them for 9 months and sell the grown calves for a higher price. This will bring in additional income which will be used to improve the family's living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase calves.

loans.name: Mugusu B Abamwe Group

texts.en: Olivia is a forty-nine-year-old married woman living in her own semi-permanent house in Fort Portal, Uganda. For two years she has been running a retail shop. She started it in order to supplement her farming activities. Her challenge is customers not paying on time and her dream is to own a wholesale shop. Olivia needs the loan facility to buy soap and salt to sell.

loans.use: to buy soap and sugar to sell.

loans.name: Shushana

texts.en:
Shushana is 51 years old. She lives in the village of Zikilia in South Georgia with her three adult children – two sons who are 28 and 25 years old, and a 23-year-old daughter. Shushana is a widow and she is runs the family's agricultural business which is their main source of income. They own one hectare of land, where potatoes, haricot beans and maize are grown. Harvested products are sold on the local market. Also the family owns four sheep. Shushana’s younger son works as a joiner. He produces furniture from wood. The total average income of the family is 450 Laris.

Shushana requested credit to purchase two milk cows. She will start cheese production and sell produced cheese on the local market as well. Starting the dairy business will significantly increase the family's income which they will then use to purchase additional household goods, to improve their living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase two milk cows.

loans.name: Beatrice

texts.en: Beatrice is a thirty-year-old married woman with two children living in Fort Portal, Uganda. For eight years she has been trading in produce and with the income earned she has been able to provide basics for the family. Her major challenge is price fluctuations and her dream is a big store that can supply the whole district. Beatrice needs the loan facility to buy beans and maize to sell.

loans.use: to buy beans and maize to sell.

loans.name: Agnes

texts.en:
Agnes is a resident and a farmer in the area of Nkubu, Central Kenya. She is aged 53 and married with three children. Her oldest two children are adults and the third is still in school. She has been in active farming for 17 years and currently sells her produce of potatoes, cabbage, milk, maize and bananas on the local market.

Agnes has requested a loan of 63,000 KES from Juhudi Kilimo to purchase and insure a dairy cow. She says this will boost her dairy farming income which will help her in feeding her family and educating the last-born child. She is aiming to concentrate more on dairy farming due to the skills she has acquired in her 17 years in the farming business.

She laments of high costs of farm inputs but appreciates Juhudi Kilimo's loan services saying it was a timely innovation for smallholder farmers.

loans.use: To purchase and insure a dairy cow.

loans.name: Fatuma

texts.en:
Fatuma is 39 years old and a mother of two children. She sells ladies shoes and has been in the business for the last two years, with a monthly profit of KES 20,000. 

Fatuma was introduced to KADET LTD by a credit officer, and she is applying for her second loan of KES 40,000 from the company. She plans to use the loan to add to her stock of ladies shoes. She will save her anticipated profits and help take care of her children. In the future, Fatuma hopes to grow her business and also venture into other investments.

loans.use: to add to her stock of shoes.

loans.name: Wilson

texts.en: Wilson wants a loan to buy more land to plant tea. The forty-five-year-old hardworking man lives in Fort Portal, Uganda. He still has challenges of unpredictable seasonal changes and his dream is to own at least forty acres of tea plantation. He used the previous loan to pay workers who were plucking his tea.

loans.use: to buy more land to plant tea.

loans.name: Las Dalcas Group

texts.es:
Este Banco comunal se llama “Las Dalcas” está conformado por 23 emprendedores, quienes se dedican a diferentes rubros entre los cuales se encuentran la venta de queso, juguetes, verduras, entre otros. Todos ellos pertenecientes a la ciudad de Puerto Montt. 
Juan integrante del Banco comunal, quien en la foto se encuentra en la primera fila de pié, ocupando el primer lugar de izquierda a derecha, viste una chaqueta sin mangas color negro.
El se dedica al rubro del comercio, específicamente atiende un mini market, en el cual vende verduras, frutas, mariscos, bebidas, entre otros productos. 
Se desempeña en este negocio desde hace 6 años junto a una de sus hijas.
Trabaja de lunes a domingo de 6ºº de la mañana hasta las 20ºº hrs de la tarde.
Comenta que su local está ubicado en el centro de la ciudad, por lo que tiene bastante clientela. Sobre todo en ésta temporada de verano.
Su mercadería la compra a agricultores en el campo, lo cual le es más conveniente monetariamente.
Con el crédito comprará verduras, específicamente papas al por mayor.
Sus metas son crecer en su negocio, para esto seguir abasteciéndolo con mercadería y obtener mejores ingresos.
Juan vive junto a su esposa y actualmente también con sus 2 hijas de 30 y 20 años de edad quienes le ayudan con el negocio de la marisquería (negocio familiar dedicado a la venta de ostras).sus sueños a nivel personal son brindarle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida, más confortable.
El está muy contento y agradecido de la oportunidad brindada por Fondo esperanza, ya que le permitirá invertir en su negocio.
Comenta además, que ha aprendido con las capacitaciones impartidas en las reuniones del Banco comunal.
Puerto Montt es una ciudad del sur de Chile, ubicada en la región de Los Lagos. Una de las atracciones de Puerto Montt son sus bellos paisajes verdes; sus playas poco frecuentadas; su gastronomía y especialmente la reputación de sus pescados y mariscos y sus artesanías. Es también la puerta de entrada a la Isla Grande de Chiloé, rica en tradiciones y leyendas.
texts.en:
This community bank is called “Las Dalcas” and has 23 members.  They all work in different fields including cheese sales, toy sales, vegetable sales, etc.  They all live in the city of Puerto Montt.

Juan is a member of this community bank.  In the photo, he is standing in the second row, on the far left, wearing a black sleeveless jacket.

Juan works in sales.  He works in a mini-mart and sells fruit, vegetables, seafood, drinks and other products.  He has been working in this business for 6 years together with one of his daughters.  He works from Monday to Sunday, from 6.00am to 8.00pm.

Juan says that his business premises are located in the city center and he has a lot of customers, especially during this summer season.  He buys his merchandise from local farmers which is most convenient for him.  He will use his loan to buy vegetables, specifically potatoes, wholesale.

Juan's goal is to grow his business.  For this reason, he will continue stocking it with merchandise and continue making better income.  

Juan lives together with his wife and his two daughters who are 30 and 20 years old.  His daughters help him with his seafood business (a family business which is aimed at selling oysters).  Juan's personal dreams are to provide his family with a better quality of life and more comforts.

Juan is very happy and grateful for the opportunity that Fondo Esperanza are giving him as it helps him to invest in his business.  He says that he has learned from the training sessions that he receives as a member of his community bank.

Puerto Montt is a city in the south of Chile.  It is located in Los Lagos region.  Some of Puerto Montt's attractions are its beautiful green landscapes, its quiet beaches, its rich cuisine and the reputation of its fish, seafood and handicrafts.  It is also one of the main ports of entry to Isla Grande de Chiloé which is rich in traditions and legends.

loans.use: to buy vegetables, especially potatoes, wholesale

loans.name: Nancy

texts.en: Nancy 31 years old, married and has four children ranging from two to ten years old. She describes herself as an honest and ambitious woman. She has been selling charcoal for the last two years. Her business challenge is insufficient funds to boost the retail charcoal sale. She hopes that by using the loan of 20,000 KES she will improve her business. In the next five years, Nancy dreams and hopes to become a wholesaler and run many similar outlets in major towns.

loans.use: To buy more bags of charcoal to sell.

loans.name: Suliko

texts.en:
Suliko is from the village of Minadze, South Georgia. He is 64 years old, married and lives with his family: his wife Noemzar, two sons aged 36 and 21, and his mother. 

All the members of the family are involved in the family's agricultural business, which is their main source of income. They have a dairy farm. Suliko and Noemzar produce cheese and sell it on local market. The family has 30 years experience in dairy farming. The total average monthly income of the family is 600 Laris, including the monthly pension of Suliko’s mother. 

Suliko requested credit to purchase an additional milk cow. The family will be able to produce and sell more cheese and increase their income. According to Suliko’s plan, part of the additional income will be reinvested in the agricultural business and the rest will be used for the family's well-being.

loans.use: to purchase a milk cow.

loans.name: Patrick

texts.en: Patrick is a thirty five year old married man living in Fort Portal, Uganda. For three years he has been operating a retail shop which has helped him to provide the basics for his family. He has a challenge due to the current hyper-inflation and his dream is to diversify and venture into farming. Patrick needs the loan facility to buy a fridge, soap and sugar to sell.

loans.use: to buy a fridge, soap and sugar to sell.

loans.name: Shamil

texts.ru:
Shamilu 39 let, on jenat i imeet dochku shkolnicu. On zanimaetsa skotovodstvom vot uje 5 let. U nego 1 korova i koza, on nujdanetsa v 500 azn dla togo chtobi kupit bichka.
Shamil xochet s doxoda biznesa nachat delat remont v stoylo. Samaya ego bolshaya mechta eto postroit sebe dom tak kak on jivet s semyey v dome postroenniy iz glinanix kirpichey. V takom dome ochen xolodno zimoy i jit tam vredno dla zdorovya.
texts.en: Shamil is 39 years old, married and has a school-age daughter.  He has been involved in animal husbandry for five years.  He has one cow and a goat and needs 500 AZN to purchase a bull.  Shamil wants to use his business profits to begin repairs in the shed.  His biggest dream is to build himself a house because he lives with his family in a house build from clay bricks.  It is very cold to live in a house like this in the winter, and it is bad for the health to live there.

loans.use: to buy one bull in order to expand his business.

loans.name: Julius

texts.en: Julius is a twenty-seven-year-old married man with four children living in Kasese, Uganda,and his personal goals are: to educate his children, build a permanent house, and buy a car. He has been a farmer for the last five years and his major hardships are price fluctuation, inflation, and unseasonable weather, however, he has goals of: buying land to grow crops and hiring employees to help expand his business. Julius wants a loan to pay workers who are weeding his garden.

loans.use: to pay workers who are weeding  his garden.

loans.name: Vepkhvia

texts.en:
Vepkhvia is a 36-year-old farmer from the village of Abastumani, South Georgia. He lives in the village with his family: his wife, Shorena, two daughters (18 and 17 years old), his 13-year-old son and his parents (retired). The children go to school. The family agricultural business is the only source of income for the family: They have a dairy farm and produce cheese and yogurt, which are sold on the local market. Also, the family grows various vegetables, on a family-owned plot of land, which are also sold locally. The total average monthly income of the family is 1000 Laris, including the pensions of Vapkhvia’s parents. 

Vepkhvia requested credit for purchasing a milk cow. They will produce and sell more dairy products. It will increase the income of the family, which will allow them to spend more on satisfying their needs and improve their living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase a milk cow.

loans.name: Doleel Djiguéne 52 Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe de crédit Doleel Djigueene 52 regroupe cinq femmes  qui font parti d’une grande association de développement. Leur activité consiste  à faire du commerce de divers produits.
La présidente, madame Ndèye Marie , vend des chaussures, des habits prêt à porter, des bijoux, des parfums etc.…Elle a une expérience de plus de dix ans dans ce domaine. Elle est marié et appui son époux sur les dépenses du foyer : frais de scolarité de ses enfants.
Avec l’épargne qu’elle fait elle envisage d’ouvrir  dans l’avenir un magasin.
.
texts.en:
The Doleel Djigueene 52 loan group is composed of five women who belong to a large development association. They buy and sell various products.

The group's president, Ndèye Marie, sells shoes, ready-made clothing, jewellery, perfumes, etc....She has over ten years of experience in this line of work. She is married and helps her husband cover family expenses: paying for their children's education.

With the loan, she plans to open a store sometime in the future.

loans.use: to buy shoes, ready-made clothing, jewellery, perfume, etc.

loans.name: Harriet

texts.en: Harriet is a 30-year-old single mother of two children living in Fort Portal, Uganda. For eight years she has been operating a bar and she started as a waitress and saved her wages to start her own business. She has a challenge of price fluctuation and customers not paying on time. Her family dream is to educate her children up to university and her business goal is a big hotel and bar. Harriet intends to use the loan facility to buy beers and sodas to sell.

loans.use: to buy beers and sodas to sell.

loans.name: John Alex

texts.en: John Alex is a thirty-eight-year-old married man living in Kamwenge, Uganda.  He has been operating a clinic for two years.  He started with just a pharmaceutical drug shop but later diversified into a clinic.  Inadequate capital to purchase pharmaceutical drugs and necessary equipment is his major challenge.  His dream is to set up another clinic in a new market.  He also hopes to educate his children and build a permanent house.  John Alex needs this loan to buy pharmaceutical drugs to resell.

loans.use: to buy pharmaceutical drugs to resell.

loans.name: Mirabbas

texts.ru: Mirabbasu 59 let, on jenat i u nego 6 detey kotorie jivut s nim. On master po proizvodstvu okon I dverey. Na danniy moment on polzuetsa starimi aparatami i v budushem on xochet priobresti instrumenti noveyshix texnologiy dla bolshego I luchchego proizvodstva i nanyat 2 rabotnikov dla pomoshi. Mirabbas xochet kredit 300 azn chtobi priobresti materiali dla remonta u seba doma I nadeetsa na pomosh dobrix ludey.
texts.en: Mirabbas is 59 years old, married and has six children, who live with him.  He is a master in making windows and doors.  Currently, he uses old equipment and in the future wants to purchase new tools with the newest technologies in order to significantly increase and improve production and hire two workers to help him.  Mirabbas wants a loan in the sum of 300 AZN to purchase materials for making repairs in his house and relies on the help of kind people.

loans.use: to buy construction materials in order to repair his house

loans.name: Doleel Djiguène 55 Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe de crédit Doleel Djigueene 55 regroupe cinq femmes  qui font parti d’une grande association de développement. Leur activité consiste  à faire du commerce de divers produits.
La présidente, madame Khoudia vend des chaussures, des habits prêt à porter, des bijoux, des parfums etc.…Elle a une expérience de plus de dix ans dans ce domaine. Elle est marié et appui son époux sur les dépenses du foyer : frais de scolarité de ses enfants.
Avec l’épargne qu’elle fait elle envisage d’ouvrir  dans l’avenir un magasin.
.
texts.en:
The Doleel Djigueene 55 loan group is composed of five women who belong to a large development association. They buy and sell various products.

The group's president, Khoudia, sells shoes, ready-made clothing, jewellery, perfume, etc....She has over ten years of experience in this line of work. She is married and helps her husband cover family expenses: paying for their children's education.

With the loan, she plans to open a store sometime in the future.

loans.use: to buy shoes, ready-made clothing, jewellery, perfume, etc.

loans.name: Solomon

texts.en: Solomon is a thirty-eight-year-old married man living in Fort Portal, Uganda.  He has been a farmer for ten years and he is still reaping tangible benefits from this work.  His major hardship is the current inflation rate.  His dream is to become a reknowned farmer in the region with over forty acres of farm land.  Solomon needs this loan to buy land for farming.

loans.use: to buy land for farming.

loans.name: Peter

texts.en: Peter is 40 years old, married, and has four children.  He runs a business cutting grass with a lawn mower to earn a living.  He has been in the business for five years and has employed two people.  He earns extra income from his farming activities. Since he joined Faulu Kenya, he has been able to save his income and hopes to be financially stable in the future. He has applied for a loan of 50,000 Kenyan Shillings to buy a new lawn mower.

loans.use: To buy new lawn mower.

loans.name: Doleel Djiguène 57 Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe de crédit Doleel Djigueene 57 regroupe cinq femmes  qui font parti d’une grande association de développement. Leur activité consiste  à faire du commerce de divers produits.
La présidente, madame Khady  vend des chaussures, des habits prêt à porter, des bijoux, des parfums etc.…Elle a une expérience de plus de dix ans dans ce domaine. Elle est marié et appui son époux sur les dépenses du foyer : frais de scolarité de ses enfants.
Avec l’épargne qu’elle fait elle envisage d’ouvrir  dans l’avenir un magasin.
.
texts.en:
The Doleel Djigueene 57 loan group is composed of five women who belong to a large development association. They buy and sell various products.

The group's president, Khady, sells shoes, ready-made clothing, jewellery, perfumes, etc....She has over ten years of experience in this line of work. She is married and helps her husband cover family expenses: paying for their children's education.

With the loan, she plans to open a store sometime in the future.

loans.use: to buy shoes, ready-made clothing, jewellery, perfume, etc.

loans.name: Nariman

texts.ru: Nariman zanimaetsa selskoxozaystvennim biznesom vot uje 9 let i odnovremenno rabotaet masterom po remontu domov. On jenat i imeet 3 detey.  Nariman xochet sdelat remont u seba doma I poetomu xochet priobresti kredit v summe 700 azn dla togo chtobi kupit stroy materiali. Vse doxodi s biznesa emu prixoditsa tratit na remont i poetomu on ne mojet rasshirit svoy biznes chto i oslojnaet emu jizn. Ego mechta eto chtobi ego deti smogli poluchit dostoynoe obrozovanie i on kak predanniy otec staraetsa radi ix budushego.
texts.en: Nariman has been involved in an agricultural business for nine years and concurrently works as a home repairs handyman.  He is married and has three children.  Nariman wants to make repairs in his home, and this is why he wants to obtain a loan in the sum of 700 AZN to purchase construction materials.  He has to spend all of his business profits on repairs, and this is why he cannot expand his business, which makes his life difficult.  His dream is that his children are able to get a decent education, and, as a devoted father, he tries hard for their future.

loans.use: to buy construction materials to repair his house

loans.name: Martu

texts.en:
Martu is 30 years old, single, and has three children, two of whom attend school.  She lives in Congo Town.  She  has been operating a shop where she sells soda and alcoholic drinks for the past  three years. 

Martu is requesting a loan to purchase more soda and alcoholic drinks for her business.  She plans to expand her business in the future.

loans.use: to purchase soda and alcoholic drinks.

loans.name: Celestin

texts.en:
Celestin is 32 years old, married, and has two children.  He lives in Fort Portal, Uganda. For six years, he has been a carpenter, which has enabled him to pay school fees for his children.

Celestin is requesting a loan, which he will use to buy timber for furniture making. He has challenges of customers not paying on time and price fluctuations. His dream is to diversify his business to include welding services.

loans.use: to purchase timber for furniture making.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for labor.

loans.name: Edson

texts.en:
Edson is 31 years old, married, and has children.  He lives in Fort Portal, Uganda. He is a civil servant and has been in service for six years.

Edson is requesting a loan, which he will use to pay school fees for himself. His major challenge is that he is not qualified to gain promotions in his job. His dream is to educate his children and attain a master's degree for himself.

loans.use: to pay school fees.

loans.name: Jiriman

texts.en:
Jiriman is married and has two children. He owns a produce business. He started as a farmer and saved to start his current business. 

Jiriman is requesting a loan, which he will use to buy rice to sell. He faces a challenge of high price fluctuations; his personal goal is to educate his children. His business goal is to expand his business to new markets.

loans.use: to purchase rice to sell.

loans.name: Evalyne

texts.en:
Evalyne is married and has children between the ages of two and 25. Seven of her children attend school. She has been in farming for six years producing milk, maize, and vegetables, which she sells locally in her hometown of Kitale.

Evalyne is requesting a loan of 31,200 KES from Juhudi Kilimo, which she will use to buy and insure a dairy cow. Dairy farming has always been her source of income to support her family. Some of the milk supplements her family's meals as well as earns income for other basic needs for her large family. She aspires to have more dairy cows to ease her family's needs. Her farming challenge remains the high cost of the management of diseases.

loans.use: to purchase and insure a dairy cow.

loans.name: Bartholomew

texts.en:
Bartholomew is 59 years, married, and has eight children. He has been a farmer for 30 years. He runs his farm with the help of one farmhand. He earns additional income from his low-cost rental housing, which he says was built with his savings from farming income.

Bartholomew is requesting his fourth loan for 40,000 KES from Juhudi Kilimo, which he will use to buy a dairy cow. Juhudi Kilimo loans have been his main source of farming assistance and income growth. The income will enable him see the last born child through school.  Animal diseases and insufficient capital remain his challenges.

loans.use: to purchase a dairy cow.

loans.name: Joseph

texts.en:
Joseph is 41 years old and a resident of Litein, South Rift, Kenya. He earns income through farming as well as lumbering. He has been in farming for four years growing potatoes, vegetables, sorghum, and tea, all of which he sells in the local market.

Joseph is requesting a loan for 20,000 KES from Juhudi Kilimo, which he will use to venture into the poultry business. He has witnessed great progress in poultry farming through other local farmers and is hopeful that he will be able to expand his business, supply far off markets, and provide for his family's  basic needs.

loans.use: to purchase poultry birds.

loans.name: Joel

texts.en:
Joel is 29 years old and single.  He owns a general store in Voi, which he has been doing for one year. 

Joel is requesting his first loan from KADET LTD, which he will use to purchase more brake fluids, car tires, and steering wheels. He will use the anticipated profits to purchase a piece of land to construct a business premises. He hopes to have a bigger and more profitable business.

loans.use: to purchase more brake fluids, tires, and steering wheels.

loans.name: Violet

texts.en:
Violet has been farming for 15 years and currently operates with the help of two farmhands. Her farm produce of potatoes, milk, maize, beans and vegetables is sold in the local market. She is the married mother of three children between 15 and 9 years of age, all in school.

Perturbed by rampant poultry diseases, Violet has requested a loan of 30,000 KES from Juhudi Kilimo to improve her poultry farming through the purchase of more birds. She adds that she will use the additional income to pay for the education of her children.

Violet aspires to improve both her farming and the state of her low-cost rental houses for better financial security.

loans.use: To buy poultry.

loans.name: Beatrice

texts.en:
Beatrice is 33 years old, married, and has five children.  She is a farmer, which she has been doing for seven years, producing and selling milk, eggs, and maize to the local market in her hometown of Kitale, Western Kenya.

Beatrice is requesting a loan for 102,000 KES from Juhudi Kilimo, which she will use to expand her farming business in two areas: dairy and poultry farming. She will use 52,000 KES  to buy and insure a dairy cow and the rest to expand her poultry business by buying more birds. 

Beatrice states that her seven years of experience in farming has proved to her that someone can rely on farming for her family upkeep. Her major challenge in farming remains the rampant animal diseases but she is optimistic that she will be owning five dairy cows in five years.

loans.use: to purchase and insure a dairy cow and purchase poultry birds.

loans.name: Florence

texts.en:
Florence is 36 years old, married, and has two children, one of whom attends school.  She has been in farming for eight years in her rural hometown of Nkubu. Her farm produces potatoes, cabbages, milk, and bananas, which she sells at the local market as well as consume some within her family. 

Florence is requesting a loan for 63,000 KES from Juhudi Kilimo, which she will use to buy and insure a dairy cow. She intends to use the income to increase the number of her dairy cows before her children start secondary school education and later on use the income to educate her children. She also intends to turn her banana retail business into wholesale once her production improves. Florence's challenge is the high input costs in the farming business.

loans.use: to purchase and insure a dairy cow.

loans.name: En Diosn Confiamos Group

texts.es: El Banco comunal En Dios Confiamos está conformado por 10 emprendedores que luchan día a día por salir adelante con sus negocios que tiene un objetivo que es de ver sus negocios bien surtidos. Este grupo ya ha tenido financiamiento con Fundación León 2000, en el crédito anterior que se les brindo lo invirtieron cada uno en sus negocios, ellos nos expresan que aumentaron su inventario y sus clientes de igual manera.  Francella actualmente está solicitando crédito para invertir en el negocio de cosméticos una de las estrategias de ventas que más le ha funcionado es que a sus clientes los visitan a domicilio, para que consuman sus productos ella comprara con el crédito lo que son lápiz labial, cremas, tratamientos, perfumes, colonias, entre otros productos que más le demandan.
texts.en:
The communal bank 'In God We Trust' is comprised of 10 entrepreneurs who strive day by day to get ahead with their businesses.  Their objective is to see their businesses well supplied. This group has already had financing from Fundación León 2000.  In the previous loan that they were offered, they each invested in their business.  They tell us that they enlarged their inventory and also their clientele.  
At present Francella is requesting a loan to invest in her cosmetics business.  One of her sales strategies that works well is that she visits her clients in their residence, so that they can purchase the products that she bought with the loan such as lipstick, creams, treatments, perfumes and cologne, among other products that are most requested.

loans.use: to buy lipstick, creams, treatments, colognes and perfumes, among other products.

loans.name: Rosalba Ceballos

texts.es:
Rosalba ha tenido que pasar por muchas adversidades en la vida para poder sacar adelante a sus 4 hijos, por lo que quiere brindarles un buen futuro donde ellos no tengan que pasar por las mismas circunstancias. 
Rosalba era madre soltera cabeza de familia hace algún tiempo, antes de conocer a su pareja actual, y en ese entonces tenía que sostener ella sola los gastos de su hogar donde convivía con sus 4 hijos. Rosalba ha sido muy trabajadora durante toda su vida, y gracias a esto ha podido sacar las fuerzas necesarias para trabajar arduamente en diferentes labores y poder generar así los ingresos necesarios para el sostenimiento de sus hijos. Desde hace un tiempo Rosalba aprendió la actividad de la compra y venta de mercancía de uso personal como son los desodorantes, pintauñas, maquillaje, ropa entre otros productos más, y con esta actividad ha podido generar los ingresos suficientes como para poder cubrir las necesidades básicas de sus hijos. Ahora, Rosalba convive con su pareja y sus 4 hijos, y gracias a esto ya su hogar cuenta con unos ingresos superiores y ha podido mejorarles la calidad de vida a sus hijos, sin embargo no es suficiente para poder asegurarles un buen futuro.
Rosalba espera que su negocio aumente las ventas, y poder así brindarles una mejor calidad de vida a las personas de su hogar, y para esto sabe que debe surtir mejor su negocio con más productos para la venta a sus clientes. Sin embargo, Rosalba no cuenta actualmente con el capital suficiente para ello, por lo que espera que un préstamo le permita acceder a la compra de los productos de uso personal como son desodorantes, pintauñas, maquillaje, ropa, entre otros más, y pueda así ofrecer una mayor variedad a sus clientes.
Rosalba espera que con el aumento en sus ventas sus hijos puedan acceder a un futuro económico estable y a una educación en una universidad donde puedan cursar una carrera que les brinde una estabilidad en sus vidas.
texts.en:
Rosalba has had to deal with many adversities in life to be able to move her family of 4 children ahead.  She wants to offer them a good future where they will not have to deal with the same circumstances.  Rosalba was a single mother for some time, before she met her current husband, and at that time she had to maintain alone the expenses of her home where she lived with her 4 children.  Rosalba has been a very hard worker all her life, and thanks to this she has been able to find the necessary strength to work arduously in different jobs and thus to be able to generate the necessary income for the support of her children.  
Some time ago Rosalba learned the activity buying and selling personal use merchandise such as deodorants, nail polish, makeup and clothes, among other products.  With this activity she has been able to generate sufficient income to be able to cover the basic needs of her children.  

Now, Rosalba lives with her husband and her 4 children, and thanks to this her home already has increased and she has been able to improve the quality of life for her children.  However, it is not sufficient to be able to assure them a good future.  Rosalba hopes to grow her sales, and to be able thus to offer a better quality of life to the people of her home.  For this she knows that she should better supply her business with more products to sell to her clients.  However, Rosalba does not at present have sufficient capital for it.  She hopes that a loan will permit her to purchase products of personal use such as deodorants, nail polish, makeup and clothes, among others, so she can offer a greater variety to her clients.  Rosalba expects that with the increase in her sales her children can have a more stable economic future and an education in a university where they can study a career that will give stability to their lives.

loans.use: to buy personal merchandise such as deodorants, nail polish, makeup and clothes to offer her clients.

loans.name: Guadalupe

texts.es:
La señora Guadalupe es una señora humilde, que se dedica a la venta de  antojitos mexicanos  como son: sopes, enchiladas verdes, enchiladas rojas, entomatadas y tacos dorados.
Es madre soltera tiene un hijo por quien trabaja para darle un mejor futuro, ella pidió el préstamo para comprar  chile verdes, chile secos, tomate, cebolla. Pollo y cebollas.
Le da las gracias a fundación por apoyarla en lo que se pueda ya que su trabaja cada día  va creciendo un poco más.
texts.en: Señora Guadalupe is a humble woman who is dedicated to selling Mexican delicacies such as: dip, green enchiladas, red enchiladas, entomatadas and golden tacos.  She is a single mother.  She has a son for whom she works to give him a better future.  She requests the loan to buy green Chiles, dry Chile powder, tomatoes, chicken and onions.  She gives thanks to the foundation for supporting her in her efforts, since her business grows each day a little more.

loans.use: to buy chiles, tomatoes and oil for making food.

loans.name: Rose

texts.en:
Rose lives in Kampala, Uganda. She is married with three children, and all of them go to school. She also cares for her father. Her house has electricity and piped water, and her major monthly expenses include food and work-related expenses.

For the last five years Rose has sold Cavendish bananas at the market, seven days a week. She must pay dues to sell there. Thieves and the seasonality of bananas are her major challenges.

Rose has requested a loan of 500,000 UGX from MCDT SACCO to buy more bunches of Cavendish bananas. Her aspiration is to become a wholesaler.

loans.use: to buy more bunches of Cavendish bananas to sell.

loans.name: Honoria

texts.es:
La  señora Honoria es una señora amable y agradecida con la vida, se dedica a la venta de pan desde hace tres años.
Es madre soltera tienen hijo por quien trabaja día con día para darle una  mejor educación y se lo agradezca en día de mañana.
Tambien se dedica a lavar ropa y playar.
Ella pidió el préstamo para la compara de: royal, harina, huevos, manteca y mantequilla.
Le da las gracias a fundación por ayudarla día a día  para que pueda seguir con su negocio.
texts.en:
Honoria is a kind woman who is grateful for life.  She has been selling bread for three years.
She is a single mother that has a son for whom she works day and night to give him a better education and she is thankful for him in the future.
She also washes clothing.
She asked for the loan to buy: baking powder, flour, eggs, lard, and butter.
She gives thanks to the foundation for helping her day after day so that she can continue with her business.

loans.use: get supplies for making bread.

loans.name: Suma Uru Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “SUMA URU” iniciará su primer ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del centro focal Los Andes, está compuesta por nueve integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva donde la señora Basilia es la tesorera. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos tenemos: costura de deportivos, venta de parrillas, comerciante de marial escolar, costura y venta de busos, venta de celulares, confección de ropa, confección de mantas, tienda de barrio.

La señora Basilia, indica que hace cinco años que trabaja en Pro Mujer y que integro la institución por invitación de una amiga. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de venta de parrillas que viene trabajando hace años, aprendiendo el mismo de sus padres.

El crédito que ahora sacará es para aumentar su capital (compra de fierros) que adquirirá de las ferreterias, por mayor, y posterior a la elaboración lo comercializará en su puesto de venta. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar a su familia, pues ella vive en  y tiene dos hijos.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta el ahorro.
texts.en:
The communal bank "Suma Uru" will start its first loan cycle with Pro Mujer, at the Los Andes central office.  This group has 9 members and is led by a board of directors where Basilia is the Treasurer.  The members of this communal bank have a variety of businesses, including: making sports clothes, selling grills, selling school supplies, making and selling sweatshirts, selling cellular phones, making clothing, making blankets, and a grocery store.

Basilia states that she has been working with Pro Mujer for 5 years, and that she joined the institution at the invitation of a friend.  Now she has a business selling grills that she has been working in for years.  She learned this trade from her parents.

The loan that she is going to take will be used to increase her capital, by purchasing iron from the ironmonger's at wholesale.  She will use this iron to make the grills that she sells from her stand.  This type of work allows her to generate resources to support her family.  She has two children.

When asked what she likes about Pro Mujer, she answered that she enjoys being able to save.

loans.use: to buy iron to make grills

loans.name: Eriberta

texts.es:
La socia Eriberta; pertenece al banco comunal "SEÑOR DE LA AGONIA DE TARAY"; El banco se encuentra ubicado en el Distrito de Taray perteneciente a la Provinccia de Pisac departamento de Cusco, 

La socia tiene 43 años de edad y es conviviente, la socia tiene 4 hijos la socia se dedica a la compra y venta de cuyes, la socia cria cuyes al por mayor los reproduce y luego vende, la socia tiene sus clientes en el mismo Taray y en la provincia de Pisac, en esta ocasión la socia desea invertir el credito en la compra de 300 cuyes hembras porque son las mas productoras, ella tiene sus jaulas de un solo piso en su casa y ha destinado dos ambientes calidos para la crianza de estos cuyes. La socia solicita el prestamo para invertir en la compra de 300 cuyes hembras.


La socia agradece el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el tiempo establecido.
texts.en:
Eriberta belongs to the "Señor de la Agonía de Taray" communal bank, located in Taray district, which is part of Pisac province, in Cusco department.

She is 43, lives with her partner, and has four children. The borrower buys and sells guinea pigs, She raises guinea pigs purchased at wholesale, breeds them, then sells them. Her customers live in the same community, Taray, in Pisac province. 

On this occasion, she wishes to use the loan to buy 300 female guinea pigs because they are the best producers. She keeps her cages on one floor at her house, and has set aside two warm rooms for the raising of these guinea pigs. 

She is applying for the loan to buy 300 female guinea pigs. The member is grateful for the loan, and promises to make her installment payments on time.

loans.use: To purchase 300 female guinea pigs.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy cell phones and accessories for them

loans.name: Pilar Jesus

texts.es:
La socia Pilar; pertenece al banco comunal "SEÑOR DE LA AGONIA DE TARAY"; El banco se encuentra ubicado en el Distrito de Taray perteneciente a la Provinccia de Pisac departamento de Cusco, 

La socia tiene 44 años de edad y es casada, la socia tiene 5 hijos la socia  se dedica a la compra y venta de cuyes, la socia cría cuyes al por mayor los reproduce y luego vende, la socia tiene sus clientes en el mismo Taray y en la provincia de Pisac, en esta ocasión la socia desea invertir el crédito en la compra de 300 cuyes hembras porque son las más productoras, ella tiene sus jaulas de un solo piso en su casa y ha destinado dos ambientes cálidos para la crianza de estos cuyes. La socia solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra de 300 cuyes hembras.


La socia agradece el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el tiempo establecido.
texts.en:
Pilar belongs to the SEÑOR DE LA AGONIA DE TARAY communal bank which is located in the Taray district, Pisac province, Cusco department.

She is 44, married, and has 5 children.  Her business is selling guinea pigs which she raises in large quantities, breeds them and then sells them to customers in Taray and in Pisac province.  Now she wants the loan to buy 300 female guinea pigs since they are the most productive.  She has 1 floor cages in her house and she has allocated two warm areas to raise these guinea pigs.  She is requesting the loan to buy 300 female guinea pigs.

The member is thankful for the loan and promises to make the payments in the designated time period.

loans.use: to buy 300 female guinea pigs

loans.name: Francisca

texts.es:
La socia Francisca; pertenece al banco comunal "SEÑOR DE LA AGONIA DE TARAY"; El banco se encuentra ubicado en el Distrito de Taray perteneciente a la Provincia de Pisac departamento de Cusco.

La socia tiene 43 años de edad y es casada, la socia tiene 4 hijos de los cuales dos son independientes; La socia se dedica a la compra y venta de artesania, ella vende sus trabjaos de arte en el mirador de Taray y su conyugue es carpintero y la socia cuando no esta vendiendo sus trabajos ya que le dan espacio solo dos dias de la semana para exhibir sus trabajos, la socia alterna sus actividades con el laqueado, y otros trabajos menores en la carpinteria de su esposo, la socia en esta ocasión desea invertir el prestamo en la compra de madera, clavos entre otros productos para realizar muebles y venderlos.

La socia agradece el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el tiempo establecido.
texts.en:
The member Francisca belongs to the communal bank Lord of the Agony of Taray. The communal bank is located in the district of Taray belonging to the province of Pisac in the department of Cusco.

The member is 43 years old and is married and has four children of which two are independent. 

The member works buying and selling crafts. She sells her works of art from the lookout point of Taray. Her husband is a carpenter. When the member is not selling her work, as she is given space only two days of the week to show her works, she alternates her work applying varnish, and other little chores involved with her husband’s work of carpentry. The member on this occasion wants to use the money from the loan to buy wood, nails and other products in order to make furniture to sell.

The member is thankful for the loan and she promises to make her payments according to the established schedule.

loans.use: to buy wood, nails and other products in order to make furniture to sell

loans.name: Silvina  Cristina

texts.es:
La señora Silvina es una señora trabajadora que se dedica a la venta de  refrescos de diferentes sabores como son: manzanita, fanta, sprit, yoli y jugos de naranja.
Esta felizmente casada con el señor Armando con quien tiene  un hijo a quien quiere mucho y apoya por todo  el apoyo que le da ya que  atiende a sus clientes y en las tardes va a comprar las naranjas para que doña Silvina prepares los jugos.
Tambien se dedica a lavar ropa y lavar trastes desde hace siete meses.
Ella pidió el préstamo  de refrescos, naranja y vasos.
Le da las gracias a fundación por apoyarla a salir adelante.
texts.en:
Silvina is a hard-working woman who works selling soft drinks of various flavors, such as es Manzanita, Fanta, Sprite and Yoli, as well as orange juices. 

She is happily married to Armando, with whom she has one child, and who provides her with a lot of support. He helps her by attending to the customers, and in the evenings he goes to buy the oranges so that Silvina can prepare the juice. 

For the past seven months, she has also worked washing clothes and washing dishes.

She requested the loan to buy soft drinks, oranges and cups. She is grateful to the foundation for supporting her progress.

loans.use: to buy soft drinks to sell.

loans.name: Maria Margarita

texts.es:
La socia Maria; pertenece al banco comunal "SEÑOR DE LA AGONIA DE TARAY"; El banco se encuentra ubicado en el Distrito de Taray perteneciente a la Provincia de Pisac departamento de Cusco.

La socia tiene 57 años de edad y es casada, la socia tiene 5 hijos de los cuales solo vive con el menor de 18 años de edad; La socia se dedica a la compra y venta de artesania la socia tiene su stand asignado tres dias a la seman en el mirador de Tray, en este se consentran las artesanas del lugar regidas por su sindicato y solo vende tres dias de la semana; y de este modo se intercalan las artesanas para que todas puedan tener la misma oportunidad de ofrecer sus ventas. En esta ocasión la socia desea invertir el prestamo en la compra de artesania y de materiales como arcilla, oxidos naturales, pinceles entre otros para la realizacion de sus trabajos.

La socia agradece el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el tiempo establecido.
texts.en:
Maria belongs to the "SEÑOR DE LA AGONIA DE TARAY" communal bank. The bank is located in the district of Taray, which belongs to the province of Pisac, department of Cuzco.   

She is 57 years old and has 5 children. Only the youngest, who is 18, lives with her. She works buying and selling artisanal crafts. She has her stand three days a week in the tourist lookout in Taray. There area artisans are governed by the union and only sell three days a week. That way, all the artisans take turns and all of them have a chance to sell their wares. On this occasion, this member wants to invest the loan in buying artisanal crafts and materials such as clay, natural oxides, brushes and other materials to do her works. 

She is grateful for the loan and committed to making her payments according to the established schedule.

loans.use: to invest in buying artisanal crafts and materials such as clay, natural oxides and brushes, among other things to do her work.

loans.name: Luz Maria

texts.es:
Luz Maria se ha caracterizado por ser una persona luchadora y pujante para sacar sus 2 hijos adelante y superar las adversidades que le ha traído la vida desde la muerte de su esposo.
Luz Maria ahora madre soltera cabeza de familia, quiere que sus hijos tengan todas las necesidades básicas satisfechas, sin embargo a menudo sus ingresos son muy bajos y no le permite acceder a esto. Luz Maria quiere que su negocio crezca y se consolide en su sector, para que así sus ventas aumenten y le genere mayores ingresos que los actuales.
Luz Maria tiene un gran sueño y es el que sus 2 hijos puedan acceder a una carrera de educación superior y puedan estudiar una carrera que les brinde la posibilidad de acceder a un empleo bien remunerado. Para esto, Luz Maria sabe que tiene que aumentar sus ingresos actuales, por lo que pretende vender más productos en su negocio.
Luz Maria tiene desde hace aproximadamente 1 año un café Internet que ya se ha reconocido en el sector por tener una muy buena atención, y ahora Luz Maria quiere que en su café Internet pueda ofrecer productos de papelería, pues sus clientes constantemente preguntan por ellos.
Luz Maria actualmente no cuenta con el capital suficiente para la compra de productos de papelería, por lo que espera que un crédito le permita acceder a la compra de productos de papelería como cuadernos, lapiceros, borradores, entre otros y pueda así satisfacer las necesidades de sus clientes y genere mayores ingresos.
Luz Maria espera que sus ingresos aumenten considerablemente y pueda mejorarles la calidad de vida a sus 2 hijos, y en futuro puedan acceder a una buena educación.
texts.en:
Luz Maria is known for being a hard fighting and energetic person in order to bring up her children and overcome the adversities that life has brought her since the death of her husband.

Luz Maria is now a single mother and head of the family. She wants her children to have all the basic needs satisfied, but at times her income is very low and she is not able to do it. Luz Maria hopes her business grows and becomes established in her location in order for her sales to increase and to generate more income than she has at the present time.

Luz Maria has a big dream and it is that her two children can have access to higher education and can study for a career that will provide the possibility to gain well paid employment. For this, Luz Maria knows that she has to increase her current income, so she wants to sell more products in her business.

Luz Maria has been working for approximately one year in the internet cafe and she is already known in the area for having good service and now Luz Maria wants to offer stationery products in her internet cafe because her customers are always asking for them.

Luz Maria currently does not have enough working funds in order to buy the stationery products, which is why is is hoping for a loan in order to be able to buy the stationery products such as notebooks, pencils, erasers, and other items and she can then satisfy the needs of her clients and earn more money.

Luz Maria hopes that her income will increase considerably and she can improve the quality of life for her two children and in the future they can access a good education.

loans.use: to buy stationery products to offer her customers the products they require

loans.name: Martha

texts.es:
La socia Martha; pertenece al banco comunal "SEÑOR DE LA AGONIA DE TARAY"; El banco se encuentra ubicado en el Distrito de Taray perteneciente a la Provincia de Pisac departamento de Cusco.

La socia tiene 43 años de edad y es conviviente, la socia tiene 4 hijos la socia se dedica a la compra y venta de artesania la socia fabrica muñecas con mantas tipicas y coloridas, la socia hace el cuerpo de trapo y los ojos la boca y la nariz con hilos negros y rojos, la socia es una mujer muy creativa y desea en esta ocasión invertir el prestamo en la compra de materiales para la fabricacion de 100 muñecas y muñecos de trapo.

La socia agradece el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el tiempo establecido.
texts.en:
The member Martha belongs to the communal bank "SEÑOR DE LA AGONIA DE TARAY."  The bank is found located in the district of Taray, belonging to the Pisac province, in the department of Cusco.

This member is 43 years old.  She lives with her life partner and has 4 children.  She works buying and selling handicrafts.  She fabricates dolls with typical, colorful dresses, making the body out of rags and the eyes, mouth, and nose using black and red threads.  She is a very creative woman and at this time, wishes to invest the loan in the purchase of materials for the production of 100 rag dolls.

She is grateful for the loan and promises to complete her payments within the established time.

loans.use: to invest in the purchase of materials for making 100 rag dolls.

loans.name: Nancy Elena

texts.es:
Nancy Elena ha sido una persona golpeada por diferentes adversidades en la vida, pues desde hace ya un tiempo su esposo murió y quedó viuda a cargo de su hijo. Actualmente Nancy Elena, una madre soltera cabeza de familia, trabaja fuertemente con el ánimo de que su hijo pueda tener la mejor calidad de vida posible y pueda acceder a una buena educación que le permita desempeñarse laboralmente en un futuro. 
Nancy Elena es muy reconocida en su sector por ser una persona muy amable y con un corazón muy noble, pues siempre quiere ayudar a las personas que más lo necesitan. 
Nancy Elena desde hace 7 años montó su taller de confección, donde ofrece el servicio de confección a terceros, y lo montó porque trabajaba en una empresa de confección donde aprendió la actividad, pero era muy mal remunerada. Desde entonces Nancy Elena viene trabajando fuertemente en su taller de confección y siempre busca que su negocio crezca para que pueda generar empleo y contratar a las personas más necesitadas. Actualmente Nancy Elena cuenta con 4 trabajadores y sus clientes son fieles a sus servicios, pues son de muy buena calidad. 
Nancy Elena en la actualidad requiere de la compra de una fileteadora para aumentar la capacidad de producción de su taller, y realizarle mantenimiento a otras 2 máquinas de su taller. Sin embargo, Nancy Elena no cuenta con el capital suficiente para ello, por lo que espera que un crédito le permita acceder a la compra de una fileteadora y a realizarle el mantenimiento que requiere 2 máquinas más. 
Nancy Elena espera que con la compra de la nueva máquina pueda generar otro puesto de trabajo, y seguir contribuyendo para que más personas puedan acceder a un trabajo remunerado y mejoren su calidad de vida. 
Nancy Elena tiene el gran sueño de que su taller crezca y pueda seguir ofreciendo más empleo y que su hijo pueda heredar una estabilidad económica que le permita progresar en un futuro.
texts.en:
Nancy Elena is a person who has been hit by life’s adversity. Some time ago, her husband died and she was left a widow with a son to support. Nowadays, she is a single mother who is head of the household. She works hard driven by the desire that her son have the best quality of life possible along with a good education that will enable him to get a good job in the future.

Nancy Elena is well known in the area as being a very kind person with a very noble heart. She is always ready to help those who most need it. Seven years ago she started her tailoring workshop where she offers services to third parties and she started it because she used to work in a tailoring business where she acquired the skill but was very badly paid. Since them she has been working very hard in her tailoring shop and she is always looking for ways to grow her business so that she can generate jobs and contract those most in need. Currently Nancy Elena has four workers and her customers are faithful because her work is of very good quality.

At present Nancy Elena needs to buy a threading machine to increase her shop’s productive capacity. She also needs to service two other machines in her workshop, however she lacks sufficient capital and hopes that a loan will enable her to buy the new machine and do necessary maintenance.

Nancy hopes that with the purchase of the threading machine she can generate another job and continue enabling more people to have access to paid work so they can improve their quality of life.

She has a big dream that her workshop will expand and she can continue offering employment and that her son will inherit economic stability enabling him to succeed in the future.

loans.use: to purchase a  threading machine and to service two machines in her workshop.

loans.name: Reyna Antolina

texts.es:
La señora  Reyna es una señora amable que se dedica a la venta de refrescos, jugos y desayunos  desde  hace un  año.
Esta felizmente casada con el señor Eusebio  Agustín un señor trabajador  que la ayuda en lo que pueda ya que trabaja de albañil y casi no tiene tiempo de  ayudarla.
Tambien se dedica a la venta de maiz.
Ella pidió el préstamo para la compra de más refrescos de diferentes sabores.
Le da las gracias a fundación por apoyarla en todo ya que sin su apoyo no tendría lo que ahora a tiene.
texts.en:
Sra. Reyna is a friendly woman who has been selling soft drinks, juice and breakfasts for the past year.

She is happily married to Sr. Eusebio Agustín, a hardworking man who helps her as much as he can however since he works as a bricklayer he does not have much time to spare.

Reyna also sells corn. She requested the loan to buy different flavored soft drinks. She thanks the Fundación for supporting her in everything she does since without its support she would not have what she now has.

loans.use: to buy soft drinks to sell.

loans.name: Rosa Mayin

texts.es:
La socia Rosa; pertenece al banco comunal "SEÑOR DE LA AGONIA DE TARAY"; El banco se encuentra ubicado en el Distrito de Taray perteneciente a la Provincia de Pisac departamento de Cusco.

La socia tiene 36 años de edad y es casada, la socia tiene 3 hijos la socia sededica  la artesania la socia  realiza trabajaos en telar y tambien en arcilla como adornos, ceniceros, y los pinta con oxidos naturales, la socia es una mujer muy trabajadora y lleva sus trabajos a vender tres veces a la semana segun lo acordado en su sindicato al mirador de Taray, la socia desea invertir el prestamo en la compra de materiales como arcillas, oxidos naturales, pinceles, lanas y otros para la realización de artesania.


La socia agradece el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el tiempo establecido.
texts.en:
Rosa is a member of the "SEÑOR DE LA AGONIA DE TARAY” Communal Bank. The bank is located in Taray District, part of Pisac Province in Cusco Department.

She is 36 and married with three children. She is an artisan who makes woven and clay goods such as ornaments and ash trays and then paints them with natural oxides. She is a very hardworking woman who takes her products to the tourist lookout in Taray  to sell three times a week, as agreed upon by her union.

Rosa wants to invest the loan in the purchase of materials such as clay, natural oxides, paint brushes, wool and other items used to make her handicrafts.

She is grateful for the loan and is committed to making her payments within the established time period.

loans.use: to buy materials such as clay, natural oxides, paintbrushes, wool and other items used to make handicrafts.

loans.name: Delfina Margoth

texts.es:
Delfina, tiene 34 años de edad, vive acompañada de sus cuatro hijas, las cuales estudian, dependen de ella, la casa en la que residen es propia; Delfina se dedica a atender un molino de nixtamal además de que tambien tiene un cafetín en el centro escolar de su residencia, este ultimo negocio lo atiende en el año escolar, ofreciendo a los alumnos alimentos y comida rápida, el molino lo atiende más que todo en las vacaciones y aquellos días que no asiste a vender.
Actualmente está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de  gaseosas, jugos, gatorade, galletas, boquitas, dulces, frutas frescas, todo para abrir nuevamente el cafetín, ya que iniciaran pronto las clases.
El objetivo de Delfina es trabajar por sus hijas, que puedan sentirse apoyadas, tambien quiere hacerle mejoras a la vivienda ya que es de adobe y en un tiempo desea fortalecerla con concreto.
texts.en:
Delfina is 34 years old and lives with her four daughters, who are in school and depend on her.  The house where they reside is hers.  Delfina works milling hominy; moreover, she also has a cafeteria in her town's school.  She works at this business during the school year, offering the students meals and fast food.  She uses the mill more than anything during school breaks and on those days when she doesn't go to sell (in her cafeteria).   

Currently, she is requesting a loan in order to purchase sodas, juices, gatorade, cookies, snacks, sweets, and fresh fruits; all to re-open the cafeteria, since classes will start soon.

Delfina's goal is to work for her daughters, so they can feel supported.  She also wants to make improvements on her home since it is made of adobe and in time, she wishes to strengthen it with concrete.

loans.use: to purchase sodas, juices, gatorade, cookies, snacks, sweets, and fruit.

loans.name: Zam

texts.en:
Zam lives in Kampala, Uganda. She is married with five children, and all of her children go to school. Her house has no electricity nor piped water. School fees and feeding the family comprise her major monthly expenses.

For the past year Zam has sold charcoal at the market, working seven days a week. She also has a hardware shop there. Transportation and the increasing price of charcoal are her major challenges.

Zam has requested a loan of 1,000,000 UGX from MCDT SACCO to buy more bags of charcoal to sell. Her aspiration is to educate her children up to university level and own a delivery van to ease her transportation problems.

loans.use: to buy more bags of charcoal to sell.

loans.name: Maria De Lourdes

texts.es:
La  señora María de Lourdes es una señora  humilde que desde pequeña ha trabajado para darle un mejor futuro a su hijo.
Ella se dedica a la venta de ropa desde hace dos años, ella nos  cuenta que lo que más le gusta  es atender bien  a sus clientes  y ofrecerle una buena mercancía.
Tambien se dedica a la venta de comida desde hace un año y a ala venta de gelatinas.
Es madre soltera pero gracias a dios a podido salir adelante con su hijo.
Ella pidió el préstamo para la compara de  mas ropa para dama, caballero, niños.
Le da las gracias a fundación por apoyarla para que pueda continuar con su negocio.
texts.en:
María de Lourdes is a humble lady who since she was young, has worked to give her son a better future.

She has worked selling clothes for the past 2 years.  She tells us that what she likes most is attending to her customers and offering them good merchandise.

She also has worked selling food for a year as well as gelatins.

She is a single mother, but thanks to God, she has been able to help her son get ahead.

She requests the loan for the purchase of more clothing for ladies, gentlemen and children.

She gives thanks to the foundation for supporting her so that she can continue her business.

loans.use: to purchase clothes to sell.

loans.name: Xochitl Cristina

texts.es:
La señora Xochitl  Cristina  es una señora trabajadora que se dedica a la venta de  abarrotes desde hace tres años es una persona amable que le gusta luchar por sus sueños.
Esta felizmente casada con el señor Roberto una persona humilde que ayuda a su esposa en cualquier problema que se le presente.
Ella pidió el préstamo para la compra de mas mercancía de abarrotes como es: jabon, aceite, cebollas.cafe, leche, pan, galletas, cereales y refrescos.
Le da las gracias a fundación por el apoyo que le ha dado para comprar más mercancía para su tienda.
texts.en:
Xochitl Cristina is a hard-working lady who has worked selling groceries for three years.  She is a kind person who enjoys fighting for her dreams.

She is happily married to Roberto, a humble person who helps his wife with whatever problem she presents to him.

She requested the loan in order to purchase more merchandise such as: soap, oil, onions, coffee, milk, bread, cookies, cereal and soft drinks.

She gives thanks to the foundation for the support that they have given her allowing her to purchase more merchandise for her store.

loans.use: to purchase groceries to sell.

loans.name: Karim

texts.es: Karim, de 32 años de edad, es una mujer trabajadora y empeñosa, además de ser muy amable y social. Está casada con Grober, quien se dedica al transporte y es padre de sus dos hijas de 08 y 2 años de edad. Juntos habitan en casa de sus padres, en compañía de su mama, hermana y  sobrina.  La actividad que realiza Karim es la venta de zapatos para damas,  asimismo ropa de damas y caballeros y productos de belleza. Todos estos productos son adquiridos por catálogos y son vendidos a familiares, vecinos y amistades,  a quienes atiende de manera cordial y amable, logrando ganarse su preferencia, de esa manera ellos la recomiendan con otras personas, que al cabo de un tiempo se vuelven también sus  clientes habituales. Tiene más de 01 año dedicándose  a éste negocio, y hasta el momento su esposo es quien más la apoya, consiguiéndole nuevos clientes. Le gusta su negocio pues le genera un ingreso económico y le permite tener una ocupación y sentirse una persona productiva, teniendo los deseos de convertirse en una prospera empresaria,. Considera su negocio bastante rentable por las buenas ganancias que le deja, y por tanto desea incrementar su stock de productos, así logrará crecer su negocio. Este será el préstamo número 02 con la institución MFP. Está muy contenta de  saber que tendrá un apoyo financiero, ya que así se sentirá segura de avanzar con su negocio. Por otro lado se siente a gusto con su banco comunal, pues  considera un grupo unido y solidario. Con el monto solicitado de 1500 nuevos soles, lo invertirá en la compra de un mayor número de mercadería, entre zapatos, ropa y cosméticos,  para tener un stock disponible para la venta, por lo que espera conseguirlos a precios más bajos por comprar en mayor volumen.
texts.en: Karim, who is 32 years old, is an industrious and hardworking woman.  She is also very kind and social.  She is married to Grober, who works in transpiration, and is the father of their two daughters who are 8 and 2 years old.  They live together in their parents' house, along with their mom, sister, and niece.  Karim sells ladies' shoes as well as women's and men's clothing and beauty products.  All of these products are acquired through catalogs, and they are sold to relatives, neighbors, and friends.  She assists them in a cordial and kind manner, earning her place.  In this way, they recommend her to other people, who after one time become her regular customers as well.  She has more than one year of experience in this business.  Her husband is the one who supports her the most, getting new clients.  She likes her business because it provides economic support and allows her to have an occupation.  She feels like a productive person and she has the desire to turn herself into a prosperous business-woman.  She thinks that her business is fairly profitable because of the good earnings that it gives her, so she wants to increase her stock of products so that she will grow her business.  This will be her 2nd loan with the MFP institution.  She is very happy to know that she will have financial support, so that she will therefore feel secure to advance with her business.  At the same time, she is pleased with her communal bank, a group that she thinks is tight and supportive.  With the total that she has asked for, 1500 nuevos soles, she will buy a large amount of merchandise including shoes, clothes, and cosmetics so as to have an available stock to sell.  She hopes to get them at lower prices for buying them in larger volume.

loans.use: buy more shoe, clothing and cosmetics.

loans.name: Mary

texts.en:
